languages.text:
"Элам, знаю, еще и одного цикла не минуло с моего назначения, но молю, прикрой меня перед Мастером Печатей, ради Императора! Я совсем забыл про одну крайне важную печать, отбегу этажом выше, чтобы ее поставить. Думаю, быстро справлюсь. Вернусь через пару часов!"
Записка покрыта толстым слоем пыли — впрочем, как и стол, на котором она лежит.

traits.locale_text:
"Элам, знаю, еще и одного цикла не минуло с моего назначения, но молю, прикрой меня перед Мастером Печатей, ради Императора! Я совсем забыл про одну крайне важную печать, отбегу этажом выше, чтобы ее поставить. Думаю, быстро справлюсь. Вернусь через пару часов!"
Записка покрыта толстым слоем пыли — впрочем, как и стол, на котором она лежит.

languages.text:
"Elam, I know it hasn't even been a full cycle since I was appointed, but please, cover for me with the Master of Seals, for the Emperor's sake! I completely forgot about one extremely important seal — I'm going to run upstairs to do it. I don't think it will take long. I'll be back within a couple of hours!"
The note is covered in a thick layer of dust, just like the table on which it lies.

languages.text:
“埃兰，我知道我从任命到现在连一个完整的周期都没过，但拜托了，请你看在帝皇的份上，去印章大师那边给我打个掩护吧！有个特别重要的章我忘盖了，我得跑到楼上盖一下。我估计这花不了多长时间，只要几个小时应该就可以回来了！”
这张字条上覆着一层厚厚的灰尘，字条所在的桌子也同样如此。
languages.original_text:
"Elam, I know it hasn't even been a full cycle since I was appointed, but please, cover for me with the Master of Seals, for the Emperor's sake! I completely forgot about one extremely important seal — I'm going to run upstairs to do it. I don't think it will take long. I'll be back within a couple of hours!"

这张字条上覆着一层厚厚的灰尘，字条所在的桌子也同样如此。

languages.text:
«Elam, sé que aún no ha pasado ni un ciclo desde mi nombramiento, pero, por favor, ¡cúbreme con la Maestra de Sellos, por el Emperador! Me olvidé totalmente de un sello extremadamente importante; voy corriendo arriba para ponerlo. No creo que tarde. ¡Serán solo un par de horas!».
La nota está cubierta de una gruesa capa de polvo, al igual que la mesa en la que se encuentra.
languages.original_text:
"Elam, I know it hasn't even been a full cycle since I was appointed, but please, cover for me with the Master of Seals, for the Emperor's sake! I completely forgot about one extremely important seal — I'm going to run upstairs to do it. I don't think it will take long. I'll be back within a couple of hours!"
The note is covered in a thick layer of dust, just like the table on which it lies.

La nota está cubierta de una gruesa capa de polvo, al igual que la mesa en la que se encuentra.

languages.text:
「イーラム、私は任命されてからの任期を全うすることはできなかった。だがどうか、私の代わりに印章長を務めて欲しい、皇帝のために！極めて重要な印章のひとつをすっかり忘れてしまった。すぐに2階へ行ってくる。時間はかからない、数時間で戻ってくる！」
メモはそれが置かれた机と同じく、何層ものホコリをかぶっている。
languages.original_text:
"Elam, I know it hasn't even been a full cycle since I was appointed, but please, cover for me with the Master of Seals, for the Emperor's sake! I completely forgot about one extremely important seal — I'm going to run upstairs to do it. I don't think it will take long. I'll be back within a couple of hours!"
The note is covered in a thick layer of dust, just like the table on which it lies.

メモはそれが置かれた机と同じく、何層ものホコリをかぶっている。

languages.text:
« Élam, je sais que cela fait à peine un cycle que j'ai pris mes fonctions, mais pour l'amour de l'Empereur, je vous conjure de bien vouloir me remplacer auprès de la maîtresse des sceaux ! J'ai complètement oublié un cachet de la plus haute importance, et je file de ce pas dans les étages pour réparer mon erreur. Cela ne devrait pas prendre trop longtemps. Je serai de retour d'ici une heure ou deux ! »
Le message est recouvert d'une épaisse couche de poussière, tout comme la table sur laquelle il est posé.
languages.original_text:
"Elam, I know it hasn't even been a full cycle since I was appointed, but please, cover for me with the Master of Seals, for the Emperor's sake! I completely forgot about one extremely important seal — I'm going to run upstairs to do it. I don't think it will take long. I'll be back within a couple of hours!"

languages.text:
"Elam, ich weiß, dass seit meiner Ernennung noch kein vollständiger Zyklus vergangen ist, aber bitte deckt mich vor der Meisterin der Siegel, um des Imperators willen! Ich habe ein extrem wichtiges Siegel komplett vergessen – ich laufe sofort nach oben und hole es nach. Es dauert bestimmt nicht lange. In wenigen Stunden bin ich wieder zurück!"
Die Notiz ist von einer dichten Staubschicht bedeckt, genau wie der Tisch, auf dem sie liegt.
languages.original_text:
"Elam, I know it hasn't even been a full cycle since I was appointed, but please, cover for me with the Master of Seals, for the Emperor's sake! I completely forgot about one extremely important seal — I'm going to run upstairs to do it. I don't think it will take long. I'll be back within a couple of hours!"

Ich habe ein extrem wichtiges Siegel komplett vergessen – ich laufe sofort nach oben und hole es nach. Es dauert bestimmt nicht lange. In wenigen Stunden bin ich wieder zurück!"

languages.text:
"Elam, atanmamın üzerinden henüz tam bir döngü bile geçmediğinin farkındayım ama n'olur, Mühür Üstadı sorarsa beni idare eder misin? İmparator'un adını verdim bak! İnanılmaz önemli bir mühür tamamen aklımdan çıkmış... Mührü basmak için bir üst kata çıkıp gelcem. Uzun sürmez bence. Birkaç saate dönmüş olurum!"
Bu not ve üstüne yapıştırıldığı masa, tamamen tozla kaplı.
